data.name: ResourceFlowDirection
data.comment: Controls the FlowDirection for all elements in the RootFrame. Set to the traditional direction of this resource file's language

data.name: ResourceLanguage
data.comment: Controls the Language and ensures that the font for all elements in the RootFrame aligns with the app's language. Set to the language code of this resource file's language.

data.name: ApplicationTitle
data.comment: Application Name

data.name: SpecialFeeds
data.comment: Title of Special Feeds Panel

data.name: ArchivedFeeds
data.comment: Text for Special Feed "Archived"

data.name: CancelAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBarButton Cancel in Settings

data.name: FreshFeeds
data.comment: Text for Special Feed "Fresh"

data.name: PublishedFeeds
data.comment: Text for Special Feed "Published"

data.name: RefreshAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBarButton "Refresh" (Feed counters)

data.name: SaveAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBar Button Save (Settings)

data.name: StarredFeeds
data.comment: Text of Special Feed "Starred Articles"

data.name: TestConnectionSettingsButton
data.comment: Text for Button to test connection in settings.

data.name: FailedConnection
data.comment: Text to display if connection to server failed.

data.name: SuccessfulConnection
data.comment: Info Text if test of connection was successful (in Settings)

data.name: SettingsConnectionHead
data.comment: Headline of connection settings page.

data.name: NoConnection
data.value: Es konnte keine Verbindung hergestellt werden. Überprüfe deine Einstellungen.
data.comment: Text for MessageBox if Server could not be reached.

data.name: OpenExtAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBarButton to open article in Browser

data.name: StarAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text of AppBarButton "Star Article"

data.name: ToogleArchiveAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBarOption to toggle Archived state of Article

data.name: TooglePublishAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBarOption to toggle Published state of Article

data.name: UnStarAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text of AppBarButton to unstar an article

data.name: MarkReadAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBarButton Mark as read

data.name: MarkUnreadAppBarButtonText
data.comment: Text for AppBar Button Mark as Unread

data.name: AllFeedsTitle
data.comment: Title for All Feeds Pivot Item at Start Page.

data.name: Categories
data.comment: Headline for Categories View on Main Page

data.name: Uncategorized
data.comment: Name of Uncategorized Category

data.name: LoadMoreArticles
data.comment: Message shown in SystemTray when more articles are loaded.

data.name: MarkReadSettings
data.comment: Label for checkbox in settings to mark articles read automatically.

data.name: PasswordSettings
data.comment: Label for textfield password in settings.

data.name: ServerSetting
data.comment: Label for textfield server in settings.

data.name: ShowAllArticles
data.comment: AppBarMenu Text to show all articles.

data.name: ShowOnlyUnreadArticles
data.comment: AppBarMenu Text to show only unread articles.

data.name: UnreadOnlySettings
data.value: Zeige nur ungelesene Artikel der Feeds
data.comment: Label for checkbox in settings to show only unread articles from feeds.

data.name: UserNameSettings
data.comment: Label for textfield username in settings.

data.name: NoArticlesMessage
data.comment: Message to show, when ArticleView has nothing to display.

data.name: SettingsAboutButtonSendLog
data.comment: Button Text to create the mail.

data.name: SettingsAboutHead
data.comment: Headline of About page in Settings

data.name: SettingsAboutRadioActualLog
data.comment: Option to send the logs of this session with mail.

data.name: SettingsAboutRadioLastLog
data.comment: Option to send the logs of last session with mail.

data.name: SettingsAboutRadioNoLog
data.comment: Option to send no log with mail.

data.name: SettingsAboutText
data.value: Nutze den folgenden Button, um mir dein Feedback per Mail zu schicken. Im Falle eines Fehlers hänge bitte auch die entsprechende Log-Datei an.
data.comment: Message to invite people sending logs.

data.name: SettingsHead
data.comment: Headline of settings page.

data.name: SettingsSortDefault
data.comment: Text for Sort option Default in Settings

data.name: SettingsSortLabel
data.comment: Text of Label for Sort options in Settings

data.name: SettingsSortNew
data.comment: Text for Sort option Newest first in Settings

data.name: SettingsSortOld
data.comment: Text for Sort option OldestFirst in Settings

data.name: MarkAllArticlesRead
data.comment: AppMenu Entry to mark all articles of a feed as read.

data.name: LoginProgress
data.comment: Progressbar message for initial login

data.name: RecentlyReadFeed
data.comment: Text of button to show recently read feeds.

data.name: AllFeedsSpecialFeed
data.comment: Text for special Feed "All Feeds"

data.name: AppBarSortLabel
data.comment: Label for sort options in appbar

data.name: SettingsAboutAuthor
data.comment: Label for author field in about pane of settings

data.name: SettingsAboutVersion
data.comment: Label for version field in about pane of settings

data.name: UnexpectedErrorMessage
data.value: Entschuldige, ein unerwarteter Fehler ist aufgetreten. Die App wird geschlossen.
data.comment: Text for MessageBox when app is closed through an unexpected error.

data.name: SettingsMailException
data.value: Entschuldige, ein Fehler trat auf beim Erstellen der E-Mail.

data.name: SettingsScrollarAsCounter
data.value: Nutze Scrollbar statt Zähler auf Artikelseite
